questionText: Become a citizen scientist and help us to record mass mating events in the mangrove crabs Ucides cordatus and Cardisoma guanhumi, in relation to the moon, between November and April each year. This information will help to improve fisheries legislation which prohibits the catch of these crabs during mass mating events. For more information click on the menu. Click on the below pictures to share your observations.

choiceOneText: I want to report the occurrence of andada
choiceTwoText: I want to inform absence of andada

description: Click on the days that you noted andada

Click the day that andada was strongest
(optional)

questionTitle: Click on the period (moon phase) when andada occured.  In case you don't know proceed to the next page.

description: Scroll and select the state where you made your observation

Enter the city closest to your mangrove
If you can not find your city in the menu you can also type the name in

questionText: Is the monitored mangrove in a protected area? (eg. RESEX, APA, Park)
extraDetailText: What is the name of the area?

description: It would be great to know who you are and how to get in contact, to acknowledge you
